code: import http from"../http-common";import authHeader from"./auth-header";var getAll=function getAll(){return http.get("/admin/users",{headers:authHeader()});};var getPublicAll=function getPublicAll(){return http.get("/users");};var get=function get(id){return http.get("/users/".concat(id));};var create=function create(data){console.log(data);return http.post("/users",data);};var update=function update(id,data){return http.post("/users/edit/".concat(id),data);};var remove=function remove(id){return http.post("/users/delete/".concat(id));};var findNearestLocation=function findNearestLocation(address,latitude,longitude){return http.get("/users/search?address=".concat(address,"&latitude=").concat(latitude,"&longitude=").concat(longitude));};var upload=function upload(file,email,onUploadProgress){var formData=new FormData();formData.append("file",file);formData.append('email',email);return http.post("/users/uploadFile",formData,{headers:{"Content-Type":"multipart/form-data"},onUploadProgress:onUploadProgress});};var getPaginationAll=function getPaginationAll(params){return http.get("/users/paging",{params:params});};var UserServices={getAll:getAll,get:get,create:create,update:update,remove:remove,findNearestLocation:findNearestLocation,upload:upload,getPaginationAll:getPaginationAll,getPublicAll:getPublicAll};export default UserServices;
